Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: the only problem with marektmaker is that it had to have all of its multitread capabilities removed to make it stable for the GUI

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: this has made it slow

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: I have been mesing around with it the last few days/weeks

Author: blackjok3r#3181

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: its 100x more resopnsive

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: like it was back in PIZZA/BEER tests

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: the app is multi threaded but the RPC interface is single thread

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: can only take 1 command at a time ... there has already been proigress on repalacing the http server in a rust variant .. mm2 will solve most issues and progress is happening on it.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: as a dodgy hack you add 2 RPC ports

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: and issue it 2 commands at once...

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: if one command has it hanging for a while the other port still works

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content:
for simplicity:
if you bet 10 at 4 odds...
you win..
you now have 50...
You now have to loose 5 times in order to loose your original bet

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: at higher odds you *will* get thrashed (I don't think 1500 odds is "real-world" possible to win in a lifetime)

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: It's literally the same principle that I used when playing craps for a living

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: the house has a considerable edge, unless you do x, y, and z

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: There is an interesting way of head-on gambling on this betting plan: Martingale bets from 0.1

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: because of the stratum disasters, I don't have any long runs over 200 that I can share atm

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Since there is a very big spread between minbet and maxbet you can push up dispersion to the cosmic highs and earn well if moon in correct position

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Bet 0.1 on odds 1/2 - if lose bet 0.2, if lose bet 0.4

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: You have 14 strikes this way 1/2

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content:
`wins: 41 losses: 136 --> 464.0`
that's the longest run I currently have in terminal 😦

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: 0.00610351562% probability to lose 14 coinflips a row

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: this then is not a bug, just the way the numbers work

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Just magic of numbers, definetly

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: I've seen guys use that method at the bj tables, all it ever did for me was get me to drop 40k on a bad shoe 😛

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: On BJ Roulettes tables min-max spreads calculated this way that player can't push dispersion over non-acceptable for house level
